title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner that bundles model weights, config and data into a single Modelfile.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (npm: ollama).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama (PyPI: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama as an LLM or embedding provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama (Maven Central: ollama4j).

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI chat tool built on ollama-python with conversation history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama generators & embedders.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Ready-to-run Docker Compose stack with Ollama, Open-WebUI & GPU support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama (NuGet: OllamaSharp).

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-node
summary: Unofficial Node.js wrapper around the Ollama REST API (npm: ollama-node).

title: ollama-go
summary: Unofficial idiomatic Go client for Ollama (go get github.com/jmorganca/ollama-go).

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama API (crates.io: ollama-rs).

title: ollama-model-list
summary: Community-curated list of GGUF models tested with Ollama (Modelfile snippets included).

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that chats using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that integrates Ollama completions into channels/DMs.
